mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO IT_MEMBER VALUES(MEMBERNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, 'N', '활동','N', '기업회원', 'N','', '', SYSDATE,'','','','N') INTO BIZ_MEMBER VALUES(MEMBERNO_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{m_regno},'N') SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT A.M_NO, M_ID, M_PW, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_IMG_PATH, M_IMG, B.M_REGNO, B.M_ADMIN_CERT, A.M_PHONE, A.m_name, A.m_birth, A.m_gender FROM IT_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN BIZ_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{m_no}
